name: acid-spray
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the target’s Special Defense by two stages.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s Special Defense by two stages.

flavor_text.black_white: The user spits fluid that works to melt the target. This harshly reduces the target’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user spits fluid that works to melt the target. This harshly reduces the target’s Sp. Def stat.
